alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Cave Creek, New River; Dripping Springs; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Globe, Miami; Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County; Superior; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 2:59PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...STRONG TO SEVERE THUNDERSTORMS EXPECTED ACROSS GILA...MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... Conditions are favorable for the development of isolated to scattered thunderstorms through the rest of the afternoon across the high terrain of east-central Arizona. Some storms may become strong to severe. Any storms that develop will be capable of producing wind gusts up to around 50 mph and brief heavy rainfall. Locations impacted include... Apache Junction, Globe, Superior, Hayden, Christmas, Gold Canyon, Sugarloaf Mountain, Sycamore Creek, Ballantine Trailhead, Roosevelt, Round Valley, Sunflower, San Carlos, Miami, Gold Camp, Cutter, Hilltop, Roosevelt Dam, Lost Dutchman State Park, and Goldfield.
